title: Enhancing Programming Practical Skills: A Science Job Simulation Instructional Design Model Based on Multiple Intelligences Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can implement science job simulations with 80% or higher completion by applying a teaching design model based on multiple intelligences theory
Learners perform science problem-solving strategies utilizing linguistic, logical-mathematical, and spatial intelligence elements in VR environments three or more times
Learners can revise and improve teaching design models two or more times by incorporating expert feedback based on Delphi research

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
